website_summaries.verdict: Another men’s shoe from the Swoosh called Nike Tessen will likely be eyed for its casual design ideal for everyday use. The shoe’s simple design does not undermine its feels on the feet. The materials used are of high quality, making many purchasers satisfied. A blend of comfort and style sets out the shoe.
pros: The majority of the reviewers that have the shoes agree that the Nike Tessen is light and comfortable
Many satisfied buyers are impressed by the casual but stylish silhouette of the shoe
A couple of owners of the Tessen from Nike is ideal for walking and working out
Several wearers are claiming that the shoe provides excellent support on the arch
According to most reviewers, the white colorway of the Nike Tessen
The shoe looks fresh and clean, says a handful of users
The textile lined interior keeps feet cozy, several users attest
cons: Because one side of the tongue is attached to the vamp, many say that the shoe closes a little weird
A reviewer mentions that the slits on the midsole accumulate pebbles and small debris

customer_reviews.title: Stability pieces on sides can be a hindrance
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves are quite comfortable and perfect for being on my feet all day however I would not recommend strenuous physical activity with them involving running or any pseudo form of that as the shoe flexibility is hindered by very hard plastic pieces on the side that are free standing rather than being attached to something and providing real support. Shipped in regular packaging and arrived in mint condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stellflue

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend and he loves them! They’re great for running, the gym and even everyday use. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hougnon

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting shoe size 12 1/2
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son and he loves them says they are comfortable and likes the look
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! As you can see I’ve already worn them and they’re amazing on the feet. They do fit a tad bit big so I would recommend getting half a size smaller. But I still love them. I’m buying a pair for my wife now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe not for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. However, I got these to help my plantar faciitis. And, unfortunately they actually aggravated the situation. After 3 minutes the pain was evident. These are probably great for someone without my problem. Light weight and very flexible
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Overall a comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was pretty lightweight comfortable. It's not the most comfortable shoe I've ever owned but it's pretty good. Works as advertised. My son also has a pair and he likes it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great daily-wear sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable, very light and easy to slip on and off if that is your type of thing. I wouldn't run a marathon in them, but they are fantastic for day-in-day-out casual wear or walking around the city/suburb. Mesh top combined with laces are what made me pick this particular pair. The wolf grey/black colorway looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Christman

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little larger than expected. Bought an 8.5 but could have gone with an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Carter

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. Period!
customer_reviews.author: Chance Ill

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and says they’re very comfortable. Easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These didn't fit as expected. I also did not like the shape of the toe area
customer_reviews.author: Mark Varner

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and very lightweight. My son love it.
customer_reviews.author: Silly Shark

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great for the gym. Be aware tho.. Had a couple sticks from mulch come all the way through the shoe tho.. Not sure its good for off trail running.. But really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: W.Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Very good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe with good support for your heel when running
customer_reviews.author: Magnus E.

customer_reviews.title: About a size too big
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 10. These run about a size too big. I gave them to my dad who’s about a size bigger than I am, so it worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Barkell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe we got on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, great shoes. The owner of the shoes has a wide foot, these are by Nike and are great !
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoes need a bit to get used to, but overall good
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bao

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: This a stylish comfortable shoes , use for workout at gym or around the house , wouldn’t run 🏃,jump, or walk long distances in these , but I’m a husky guy , if your light in the azz you’ll do well , but I need more shock absorbing shoe ...
customer_reviews.author: A. Slay

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Tessen Competition Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Running Shoes Man Nike NIKE TESSEN AA2160-400
feature_bullets: 'Slim fitting, vulcanised outsole for grip and flexibility
Shaped soles follows the shape of your foot for cushioning and feeling on your board
Back stay gore allows for a snug and secure fit and bold sentiment driven for board
Padded mesh tongue and collar for cushioning and breathability
